text: Charles L. Napier (April 12, 1936 â€“ October 5, 2011) was an American actor. Napier was born on April 12, 1936, near Scottsville, Kentucky, Napier moved to Hollywood after graduating from Western Kentucky University with a degree in art. His first acting position in Hollywood was on an episode of Mission: Impossible. Napier later acted as military figures villains, such as playing Marshal Murdock in the movie Rambo: First Blood Part II. Napier died on October 5, 2011, in a hospital in Bakersfield, California from thrombosis, aged 75. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2011 deaths Category:Deaths from thrombosis Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:actors from Kentucky
title: Charles Napier
